title: On the Second Try, a Family Is Welcomed in Queens
description: Trading a co-op for a single-family house in a different neighborhood solved the problems of a growing brood.
dc:creator: D.W. Gibson
media:description: Patrick Boyd and Natalia Nakazawa moved into their single-family house in East Elmhurst, Queens, with their older son, Kai, before their second son, Gael, came along. The house has three bedrooms and gives them more privacy than the co-op they were moving out of. There is also a front yard for a garden and a backyard for a grill and parking.
